mapper.select:
SELECT TI.ID, TI.VALID, TI.PARENTID, TI.BASEPARENTID, TI.NAME, TI.CODE, TI.CREATEDATE, TI.LASTUPDATEDATE FROM BD_INDUSTRY TI WHERE
AND TI.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BD_INDUSTRY ( ID, VALID, PARENTID, BASEPARENTID, REMARK, NAME, CODE, CREATEDATE, LASTUPDATEDATE ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{valid}, #{parentId}, #{baseParentId}, #{remark}, #{name}, #{code}, #{createDate}, #{lastUpdateDate} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM BD_INDUSTRY WHERE
AND ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE BD_INDUSTRY
VALID = #{valid,javaType=boolean},
PARENTID = #{parentId,javaType=java.lang.String},
BASEPARENTID = #{baseParentId,javaType=java.lang.String},
REMARK = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
NAME = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
CODE = #{code,javaType=java.lang.String},
CREATEDATE = #{createDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
LASTUPDATEDATE = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
WHERE ID = #{id}
